    Michael Guymon

    • Constructor Detail

      • Naether

        public Naether()
        Create new instance. Default local repository is environment M2_REPO setting or user home and .m2/repository. The local repository is the destination for downloaded metadata and artifacts. The default remote repository is http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/

    • Method Detail

      • clearDependencies

        public void clearDependencies()
        Clear dependencies

      • clearBuildArtifacts

        public void clearBuildArtifacts()
        Clear local BuildArtifacts

      • addBuildArtifact

        public void addBuildArtifact(String notation,
                    String path,
                    String pom)
        Add a local Build Artifact manually by String notation, path to the artifact, and path to the POM. The Build Artifact will override matchingdependencies found when resolving dependencies.
        Parameters:
        notation - String
        path - String
        pom - String

      • addBuildArtifact

        public void addBuildArtifact(String notation,
                    String path)
                      throws NaetherException
        Add a local Build Artifact manually by String notation and path to the artifact. The POM for the artifact is created automatically based on the String notation. The Build Artifact will override matchingdependencies found when resolving dependencies.
        Parameters:
        notation - String
        path - String
        Throws:
        NaetherException - if failed to create a POM

        Parameters:

      • addDependencies

        public void addDependencies(Project project,
                   List<String> scopes)
                     throws ProjectException
        Add dependencies from a Maven POM, limited to a List of scopes. Adds all Repositories from the Maven Pom.
        Parameters:
        project - Project
        scopes - List of dependency scopes
        Throws:
        ProjectException

      • install

        public void install(String notation,
           String pomPath,
           String filePath)
             throws InstallException
        Install Artifact to local repo. If installing a POM, filePath can be null. If install a Jar without a POM, pomPath can be null.
        Parameters:
        String - notation String
        String - pomPath String
        String - filePath String
        Throws:
        InstallException
